alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Calhoun and southeastern Lexington Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gaston, or 12 miles south of Cayce, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gaston, Swansea and Lexington Acres Pond. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 123 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
